title: Echo: Black Hole
description: Julie and Ivy must stop the launch of the ill-fated Phi Collider, but scientist Hong Liu has other plans when he takes the pair hostage. With the fate of the world on their shoulders, the women must escape, track down a serial killer and retrieve the remaining Alloy 618. Complications arise as the side effects of the powerful allow cause Julie to grow larger as Ivy grows younger. Collects issues #21â€“25.
author: Terry Moore
